column2: Description
column17: Human (speeding, Seatbelt, Helmet, Drwosy, imparied, distracted)

column2: Pontiac Trail west of West Road, pedestrian hit by two vehicles.
Williams Lake Road, near Pirrin Drive, west of Airport Road, two vehicles head on collision.
Davisburg Road and Ormond Road intersection (two fatalities), two vehicle crash (angle).
Pontiac Lake Road at Scott Lake Road, west of intersection, single vehicle lost control, run off the road and hit utility pole and a fence.
Grass Lake Road, south of Woodland Road, ATV run off the road, hit tree and ejected, hit a second tree.
Oakwood Road at Legault Boulevard, vehicle stopped on Road for left turning vehicle, rear ended by a truck.
Milford Road, south of Davisburg Road, motorcyclist lost control at railroad crossing.
Bald Eagle Lake Road, near Bird Road, single vehicle lost control, run off the road and struck a tree.
Baldwin Road and Davison Lake Road intersection, two vehicles, angle crash, fail to yield right of way at a stop sign.
Sashabaw Road and Flemings Lake Road intersection, two vehicles, angle crash.
East Leonard Road, near Secord Lake Road, single vehicle crash, collided with a tree lying in the road.
Pontiac Trail WB at Century Drive, two vehicles, semi-truck stopped to turn left hit in rear by another vehicle driven by intoxicated motorist.
Crooks Road NB and Long Lake Road WB, two vehicles, angle crash.
Jossman Road SB, north of Perryville Road, single vehicle run-off the road and hit a tree.
Long Lake Road EB, two vehicles, head-on left turn.
Hickory Ridge Trail NB, south of General Motors Road, single vehicle run-off the road and hit two trees.
Southfield Road SB, single vehicle run-off the road and hit a tree.
Pedestrian crossing Orchard Lake Road at Powers Road was hit by a northbound vehicle. The pedestrian died in the hospital on 01/15/10.

Joslyn Road NB, south of Clarkston Road, near DNR Lake Sixteen access site. NB vehicle loss control (snow & icy conditions) and crossed centerline, struck by SB vehicle, angle accident. Three fatalities in NB vehicle.

Lasher Road at Eleven Mile Road, NB motorist travelling at high rate of speed runs red light and hits WB motorist making left turn. Third vehicle also involved. Motorist in first and second vehicle killed.
A NB Dequindre Road motorist was killed when making a left turn at Maple Road on the permissive phase and was hit by a SB motorist. Four vehicles were involved.
Motorist WB on Commerce Road, west of Harold Avenue was killed when he lost control and hit a tree fleeing the seen of another accident.
Grand River Avenue near Napier Road, EB car crossed centerline and hit by WB truck. Passenger in the car was killed.
Wixom Road near West Road, NB truck crossed centerline and hit by SB Wixom Road vehicle. Driver of vehicle heading southbound was killed.

A motorist EB on Maple Road at Wixom Road entered the intersection on the red indication and hit a NB motorist. The driver of the NB Wixom Road Vehicle died in the hospital 11 days after the accident.
Livernois Road north of Big Beaver Road, SB motorcyclist killed when he hit a car that pulled out in front of him from the northern most driveway of the Liberty Center.
Dequindre Road and Fourteen Mile Road. Bicyclist hit by two different vehicles.
EB Long Lake Road near Kensington Road. Motorist struck tree and was killed.
Sheldon Road at Snell Road, NB unlicensed underage motorist disregarded stop sign and hit a WB motorist, killing the driver.
Motorist on SB Middlebelt Road changed lanes at a high rate of speed into the northbound lane, struck and killed a bicyclist near Linden Street.
Motorist on EB Pontiac Trail, east of Bradford (e/o Martindale Road), turned left into driveway in front of EB motorcyclist. Driver of Motorcycle was killed and passenger died 3 days later.
Motorist WB Stoney Creek Road, west of Rochester Road was killed when she lost control and hit a tree.
Motorist travelling westbound on Twelve Road at Stansbury Boulevard crossed the centerline and hit eastbound vehicle head on. Passenger in westbound vehicle was killed.
Motorist travelling northbound Milford Road died the next day after they turned left at Mill River Boulevard and hit a southbound Milford Road vehicle.
Motorist travelling southeasterly on Andersonville Road near Northwest Court hit and killed a pedestrian walking along the road.
NB Orchard Lake Road, north of Northwestern Highway a motorist hit and killed a pedestrian that was walking in the middle of the road.
WB Motorist on Grange Hall Road west of North Saginaw Road/North Holly Road hit and killed a pedestrian crossing the Road west of the intersection.
NB Hickory Ridge near Dunham Road motorist was killed when they ran off the road and hit a tree.
Pedestrian was killed at the intersection of Haggerty Road and Ten Mile Road when they were hit by a vehicle. They were crossing Ten Mile Road on the east leg.

Motorist travelling SB Dequindre Road, south of Square Lake/19 Mile Road started passing another SB vehicle, hit this vehicle first and then hit a NB vehicle head-on killing the driver of the NB vehicle. Alcohol was a factor in the crash.

Motorist travelling SB Dequindre Road just north of Long Lake Road lost a load from the bed of his pickup truck. He turned around and returned to retrieve his belongings. After exiting his vehicle he was hit by a SB motorist and was killed.  The SB motorist did not stop at the scene of the accident.
Motorist travelling SB on Duck Lake Road south of Engleman Road was killed when he lost control of his vehicle and hit a tree. Alcohol and/or drugs may have been a factor in the crash.

Motorist travelling NB Milford Road, south of I-96 was killed when he drifted left of the centerline and hit a SB vehicle head-on. Police said he may have suffered a medical problem that resulted in the accident.
Motorist travelling SB Williams Lake Road, just south of Kenwick hit two pedestrians walking in the road. One pedestrian was killed.

Motorist travelling SB Baldwin Road, south of High View Drive (south of Drahner road) ran off the road into the ditch, struck a large rock and then a utility pole. The driver died 5 days later in the hospital.
A motorist travelling WB Eight Mile Road, west of Beck Road near Westview Drive crossed the centerline and crashed into an EB vehicle killing the driver.
Motorist travelling WB Williams Lake Road, just east of Manila Court (east of Sashabaw Road) hit and killed a pedestrian walking in the center of the road.
Pedestrian walking on Cass Elizabeth Road near Iroquois Street was hit by a motorist and killed.
One motorist was killed when three vehicles were involved in a crash at the intersection of 12 Mile Road and Greenfield Road.
A motorist travelling NB Lahser Road, near Midway Avenue was killed when they crossed the centerline and crashed into an SB vehicle.

Motorist on eastbound Silverbell Road was killed when he went past construct zone signs and crashed through Road Closed Barricades hitting two parked pieces of the contractor’s heavy equipment vehicles.

Motorist on southbound Middlebelt Road, 2,500 feet north of Eleven Mile Road crossed the centerline and sideswiped a northbound vehicle and then hit a second northbound vehicle head-on.  A passenger in the southbound vehicle was killed.
Motorist was killed when they pulled out from gas station driveway south of University Drive in front of a Tandem Trailer Truck traveling NB on Opdyke Road

SB Motorist on John R Road, north of Losee Drive turned left into the Best Buy parking lot driveway and was hit by a northbound vehicle. Driver of the SB vehicle was taken to the hospital and released the next day. She was found dead at her home later that same day.

Motorcyclist eastbound on Lone Pine Road at Lasher Road when starting out from the green light, popped the clutch and lost control turning right onto southbound Lasher Road, striking the curb and falling from the motorcycle onto the shoulder.

A motorist exiting a private drive approach just east of Franklin Road failed to yield the right of way when they pulled out in front of a motorcyclist travelling eastbound on 12 Mile Road, approaching Northwestern Highway. The motorcyclist was killed.

A motorist northbound on Greenfield Road at Oxford Avenue/San Quenton Avenue had right rear door open transporting a large metal cabinet. The door struck a sign on the southeast corner and veered across all lanes to the northwest corner and ran into a utility pole.
A northbound Giddings Road motorist, south of Liberty Drive struck and killed a bicyclist also travelling northbound.
Motorcyclist westbound on Elizabeth Lake Road at Glandon Street (East of Union Lake Road) ran off the road, clip some mailboxes and lost control.
A motorist eastbound on Pontiac Trail, 500 feet east of Old Orchard Trail ran off the road into a ditch and struck a tree.
A motorist on westbound Clarkston Road was killed when they turned left onto Sashabaw Road in front of an eastbound motorist.

A motorist was killed when travelling southbound on Silver Lake Road south of Walton Boulevard. They first crossed the centerline and sideswiped a northbound vehicle, then spun around and were hit by a third vehicle also travelling southbound.

Motorcyclist with passenger was eastbound on Pontiac Lake Road at Erwindale Road (West of M-59) and crossed the centerline in a curve and hit an eastbound vehicle. The passenger was thrown from the motorcycle and killed.
Driver of a moped on westbound South Boulevard just east of Sheffield Road fell off his moped and later died from his injuries.
NB motorist on Milford Road between Rose Center Road and Davisburg Road crossed the centerline and hit a southbound motorist. Drivers of both vehicles were killed.
EB motorist on Baybrook Drive east of Pine Orchard Drive was killed when they ran off the road left into a ditch and hit a tree.
SB motorist on Silver Lake Road at Dixie Highway was stopped for a red light proceeded to make a right turn on red and hit a pedestrian. The pedestrian died later at the hospital.
NB motorist on Novi Road was killed when they ran the red light at 12 Mile Road and was hit by an eastbound truck pulling a trailer with a backhoe on it.
NB Motorist on Cooley Lake Road near Brookhaven Court crossed the centerline and hit a westbound/southbound vehicle head-on. The driver of the second vehicle was killed.

EB Motorist on Pontiac Trail just west of South Hill Road crossed the centerline and ran off the road continued eastbound in the ditch before striking a tree and rolling over. The driver was ejected from the vehicle. Alcohol believed to be a factor.

EB motorist on Middle Road, east of Hickory Ridge Road ran off the road, struck several trees and overturned the vehicle while falling down an embankment. A passenger was ejected from the vehicle and died.

WB Walton Blvd motorists crossed the centerline striking a guardrail and then sideswiped vehicle #2 before hitting vehicle #3 head-on that was EB on Walton Blvd. Elderly driver of vehicle #1 was transported to the hospital where he was pronounced deceased. He may have suffered a medical condition prior to the crash.

Pedestrian walking in the eastbound lane of West Maple Road approximately 1,000 feet east of Benstein Road was hit by a vehicle. Driver of the vehicle did not stop. Pedestrian died from injuries the following day.
Pedestrian crossing Southfield Road at George Washington Drive (south of 10 Mile Road) from west to east was killed when struck by two southbound vehicles.

Motorist with passenger in the vehicle on northbound Baldwin Road approximately 300 feet north of Judah Road lost control during snow and blowing snow conditions and crossed the centerline where they were hit by a southbound vehicle. The passenger was killed.

Motorist was killed when travelling westbound on Pontiac Lake Road, near Margie Drive, west of Fisk Road when a tree fell on their vehicle. The vehicle came to rest in a swampy ravine. The drive died the next day from injuries sustained in the accident.
Pedestrian in the middle of southbound Carroll Lake Road, just south of West Grand Traverse at night was killed when struck by a southbound vehicle.
A motorist has died the following day after a crash on northbound Rochester Road, north of Gunn Road where she hit a snowy patch and slid across the centerline into the path of a southbound motorist.

Motorist with passenger travelling on eastbound Cooley Lake Road near McDougal Street crossed the centerline and ran off the road into the ditch, rolled over and hit a fence, both were ejected from the vehicle, neither were wearing a seatbelt. The driver was killed. Alcohol is believed to be a factor in the crash.
Motorist was killed when they crossed the centerline on northbound Harvey Lake Road, just south of Dunleavy Drive, and hit a southbound vehicle head-on.

Motorist was killed when they crossed the centerline on northbound Haggerty Road near the intersection of Oakley Park Road, and hit a southbound vehicle head-on. The southbound vehicle was hit from behind by a third vehicle involved in the crash.
Motorist was killed when they crossed the centerline on westbound Pontiac Trail, approximately 1500 feet west of West Park Drive, and hit an eastbound vehicle head-on.
Motorist was killed when they crossed the centerline on northbound Sashabaw Road just north of Meigs Avenue and hit a southbound vehicle head-on.

Motorist was killed when they crossed the centerline on northbound White Lake Road approximately 500 feet north of Andersonville Road, sideswiping a southbound vehicle before crashing head-on into a second southbound vehicle.
Motorist travelling westbound on East Holly Road, west of Webber Road, lost control ran off the road and overturned several times. The driver was killed and the passenger was an A injury.

A motorist northbound on Farmington Road turned left onto Kingsfield Drive and was hit by a southbound vehicle. The passenger in the turning vehicle died seven days later in the hospital from the injuries.
A motorcyclist on northbound Sashabaw Road was killed when they ran into the back of another vehicle stopped to make a left turn onto Bella Rose Boulevard.

A motorist southbound on North Holly Road, south of Mitchell Road, lost control of their vehicle and ran off the road rolling the vehicle over. The driver was not wearing a seat belt and was ejected from the vehicle. Alcohol was a factor in the crash.
A motorcyclist northbound on Newton Road at Listeria Street/Rio Vista Street was killed when he lost control, crossed the centerline and slid into a southbound vehicle.
RCOC truck driver on Pearson Road, just east of Milford Road was killed when the RCOC truck overturned on the shoulder.

Two motorists were killed when a westbound Eight Mile Road vehicle, east of Napier Road at the sports Park Driveway crossed the centerline and hit an eastbound vehicle head-on. Drivers of both vehicles died.

A westbound Long Lake Road motorist turning left into Saddle Brook Court failed to yield to an eastbound motorist and their vehicle was struck on the passenger side. A passenger in the westbound vehicle was killed.

A motorist was killed when travelling on westbound Pontiac Trail, west of Grace Rae Court, crossed the centerline and ran off the road hit two utility poles, a sign post and two trees before coming to a stop. Alcohol and excessive speed is believed to be a factor in the crash.
Two vehicle collision on Milford Road, just north of Forest Ridge Drive/Heritage Drive resulted in one fatality and an A-injury. Dense fog in the area and alcohol may have been factors in the crash.
A motorist travelling north on Coats Road was killed when she lost control south of Oakwood Road and ran off the road and hit a tree. Alcohol appears to be a factor in the crash.

A motorist travelling westbound on Grange Hall Road west of Judy Ann Road was killed when he sideswiped another vehicle and ran of the road into several trees. Alcohol and excessive speed may have been factors in the crash.

A motorist travelling northbound on Opdyke Road at M-59 crossed the centerline and hit a southbound vehicle head-on. The motorist in the southbound vehicle was killed. Alcohol is believed to have been a factor in the crash.

A motorist travelling northbound on Adams Road, north of Butler Road crossed the centerline and sideswiped a southbound vehicle, then hit a second southbound vehicle head-on. The driver that crossed the centerline was killed in the crash. A pre-existing medical condition may have been a factor in the crash.

A motorist travelling southeasterly on Andersonville Road was killed when they lost control on the snow covered road coming out of the curve approximately a half-mile northeasterly of Northwest Court. Their vehicle sideswiped a northwesterly travelling vehicle and then was hit by another northwesterly travelling vehicle after they slide sideways in front of it.
Motorcyclist on Milford Road was killed when they collided with a van near Munger Road.
A motorist was killed when they ran off the road at a high rate of speed on westbound Holcomb Road, east of Brook Lane, and hit a tree.

A motorcyclist travelling at a high rate of speed eastbound on Clarkston Road at Lakeview Drive lost control, crossed the centerline, and hit the side of a westbound vehicle. The motorcyclist died from their injuries.
A motorist travelling southbound on Lahser Road ran a red light at Eleven Mile Road and hit a westbound vehicle. A passenger in the westbound vehicle was killed.
A motorcyclist travelling eastbound on Elizabeth Lake Road was killed when a westbound motorist turned left onto Exmoor Road in front of the motorcycle.

A motorist travelling northbound on Hall Road turning left onto Andersonville Road was killed when his vehicle slid sideways, hit a guardrail, went airborne over the guardrail and was ejected. The driver was not wearing a seatbelt.

A motorist travelling eastbound on Andersonville Road, 200 feet east of White Lake Road crossed the centerline and hit a westbound vehicle head-on. The motorist that crossed the centerline was killed.

A motorist travelling southbound on Sashabaw Road, 50 feet north of Island Park Drive slide sideways across the centerline and was hit by northbound vehicle on the passenger side. A passenger in the vehicle that crossed the centerline died 8 days later from injuries sustained in the crash.

A motorist travelling eastbound Seymour Lake Road, 1500 feet west of Sashabaw Road loss control during icy road conditions coming out of curve, slid sideways across the centerline and was hit by a westbound vehicle. A passenger in the vehicle that crossed the centerline was killed.

A motorist travelling on northbound Dequindre Road, a quarter mile south of Avon Road loss control of their vehicle, crossed the centerline and was broadsided on the passenger side by a southbound vehicle. The driver of the northbound vehicle was not wearing a seatbelt and was killed. Alcohol appears to be a factor in this crash.

A motorist that may have had a medical problem prior to crashing was killed when they ran off the road on northbound Crooks Road, 850 feet south of Hamlin Road, hit a traffic sign and then a street light pole.
At night a pedestrian walking in the southbound lanes of Opdyke Road, just north of Warwick Way (south of Auburn Road) was killed when they were hit by a southbound vehicle.

A motorcyclist travelling westbound on Williams Lake Road, just west of Airport Road (north leg) was killed when he weaved around two other vehicles travelling westbound and hit a vehicle travelling eastbound that was turning left into a gas station driveway.

A motorist travelling northbound on Orchard Lake Road made a left turn into the driveway of the Beaumont Hospital and was hit by a southbound motorist. A passenger in the northbound vehicle was killed.

A motorist travelling westbound on Big Beaver Road at a high rate of speed ran a red light at the crossover east of Livernois Road, at Troy Street and was broadsided by a motorist using the crossover. The driver of the westbound vehicle was not wearing a seatbelt and was ejected from the vehicle and died later from their injuries.
A motorist travelling westbound on Ten Mile Road, west of Milford Road was killed when they crossed the centerline and hit an eastbound semi-truck head-on.
A pedestrian walking westbound on Woodsedge Drive, west of Williams Lake Road in White Lake Township was killed when a septic truck backing up in the same direction struck them.

A motorcyclist travelling westbound on Pontiac Lake Road, approximately 600 feet west of Oak Pointe Drive was killed when they crossed the centerline and ran off the road hitting a mailbox and then a traffic sign. Alcohol is believed to be a factor in the crash.

A motorist travelling northbound on Dixie Highway, 900 feet north of I-75 was killed when they crossed the centerline, ran off the road into a ditch causing the vehicle to rollover. Authorities believe a medical issue may have contributed to the crash.

A motorist travelling southbound on Milford Road, 1000 feet south of Travis Road was killed when they swerved left to avoid another vehicle turning left and crossed the centerline hitting a northbound vehicle head-on.
A motorist travelling southbound on Dequindre Road was killed when they ran a red light and were hit by a westbound Big Beaver Road vehicle.
A motorist travelling southbound on Dixie Highway, between Holdridge Road and Tripp Road, ran off the road, rolled over, and hit a tree. A passenger in the rear seat of the vehicle was killed.
A motorcyclist travelling southbound on Benstein Road was killed when they ran off the road into a small ditch on a curve and was thrown from the motorcycle. Alcohol was a factor in the crash.
At night a pedestrian walking in the southbound lane of Haggerty Road, 800 feet north of Fourteen Mile Road was killed when they were hit by a southbound vehicle.

A motorist travelling westbound on Elizabeth Lake Road, 200 feet east of Cruse Avenue was killed when they left the road to the right, re-entered the road and crossed the centerline, left the road on the left, flipped the vehicle ejecting the passenger who survived. Alcohol was a factor in the crash.
At night a pedestrian at the intersection of North Holly Road & Quick Road was killed in a hit-and-run accident.
A motorist travelling southbound on Rochester Road north of Tienken Road was killed when a northbound motorist crossed the centerline and hit them head-on. Alcohol was a factor in the crash.
A pedestrian near the intersection of Hickory Ridge Road & Bone Road was killed in a hit-and-run accident.
At night a pedestrian crossing the east leg of the Crooks Road & Maplelawn Road intersection was killed when a bus travelling southbound made a left turn.
A motorist turning left from southbound Huntington Park Drive onto eastbound Walton Boulevard (east of Silver Lake Road) was hit by a westbound vehicle and killed.

A motorist and one of his three passengers was killed when he lost control of his vehicle on Pontiac Trail, west of Martindale Road during icy road conditions, crossed the centerline hitting an eastbound vehicle.
A motorist travelling southbound on Baldwin Road, south of Indianwood Road was killed when they crossed the centerline and hit a northbound vehicle head-on.

A motorist travelling westbound on Pontiac Trail was stopped to make a left turn at Wellington Drive and was rear ended by another westbound vehicle causing the stopped vehicle to spin around and flip over bursting into flames killing the driver. Alcohol was a factor in the crash.

A motorist southbound on Crooks Road at Hamlin Road turning left was hit head-on by a northbound motorist travelling through the intersection. The northbound motorist was admitted to the hospital for their injuries and died on 06/28/15 from injuries sustained in the crash.
A motorist travelling southbound on Welch Road, near Stony Lane, was killed when they lost control slid sideways across the centerline and was hit by a northbound vehicle.

A motorist travelling northbound on John R Road, 800 feet north of Girard Avenue, at a high rate of speed was killed when they lost control and ran off the road hitting a building. Alcohol was a factor in the crash.

A motorist travelling eastbound on Long Lake Road, east of Blair Drive with passenger was distracted and ran over construction cones before hitting a parked commercial vehicle (dump truck) with flashing lights activated. The passenger in the vehicle was killed.
A motorcyclist travelling southbound on Orion Road, south of Dutton Road was killed when they crossed the centerline and hit a northbound vehicle head-on.
A motorist travelling eastbound on Commerce Road, east of W. Dow Ridge Street hit and killed an eastbound bicyclist riding on the shoulder.

A motorist southbound on Beckley Avenue failed to yield and hit an eastbound vehicle on Drahner Road which caused it to spin out of control and be hit by a westbound motorcyclist. The motorcyclist was killed.
A motorist travelling southbound on Dixie Highway, north of Old Pond Road was killed when they crossed the center lane for left turns and hit a northbound vehicle head-on.

A motorist northbound on Orchard Lake Road at Maple Road turning left was hit by a southbound motorist travelling through the intersection. The northbound motorist was admitted to the hospital the following day for their injuries and died on 06/30/15 from injuries sustained in the crash.
A motorist travelling northbound on Cooley Lake Road 300 feet north of Lake Vista Drive lost control, hit a guardrail ending, then a tree and was killed.

A motorist travelling northbound on Southfield Road, at Filmore Place was killed when they hit a northbound stopped vehicle, crossed the center lane for left turns ejecting themselves when they hit a stopped southbound vehicle pushing it into five other vehicles.
A pedestrian crossing Pontiac Trail, 150 feet west of Deer Run Circle was killed when they were hit by a westbound vehicle.

A motorcyclist travelling southbound on Hadley Road, at Sawmill Lake Road was killed when they lost control in a curve, left the road and hit a tree. A witness reported that the motorcycle was moving at a high rate of speed.
A pedestrian in Adams Road, near Woodcrest Road was killed when they were hit by a northbound vehicle.

A motorist westbound on 11 Mile Road at Milford Road disregarded a Stop Sign while distracted on their cell phone and was hit by a southbound vehicle. A passenger in the westbound vehicle was killed. Alcohol appears to have been a factor in the crash.

A motorcyclist travelling eastbound on Grand River Avenue, just west of Jeffrey Court (east of Kent Lake Road) was killed when they tried to pass another vehicle on the right side and loss control hitting a bolder. A passenger on the motorcycle is listed as an A injury.
A pedestrian crossing Dixie Highway, 900 feet north of Ridge Valley Road was killed when they were hit by a northbound vehicle.

A motorist travelling northbound on North Holly Road south of Lahring Road was killed when they lost control, left the roadway, hit a tree and rolled over. Speed and wet roadway are believed to have factored into the crash.
A motorist travelling westbound on South Boulevard, just west of Squirrel Road was killed when they crossed the centerline and hit an eastbound vehicle head-on.

A motorist travelling southbound on Taylor Road, 150 feet Taylor Lake Court was killed when they lost control and was ejected from the vehicle after hitting a tree. witnesses reported hearing the vehicle travelling at a high rate of speed.
A pedestrian crossing John R Road, at the intersection of Highbury Drive/Oak Forest Drive, south of Square Lake was killed when they were hit by a southbound vehicle.
A pedestrian crossing Duck Lake Road, 1000 feet south of Teeple Lake Road at driveway address number 1750 was killed when they were hit by a southbound vehicle.
A bicyclist crossing Elizabeth Lake Road, 150 feet west of N Josephine Avenue/Summit Drive was killed when they were hit by a westbound vehicle.
A pedestrian crossing Cooley Lake Road at Huntwood Park Drive was killed when they were hit by an eastbound vehicle.
A motorist traveling northbound on Bogie Lake Road at Cedar Island Road (East Intersection) was killed when they attempted to make a U-turn and were hit by a southbound vehicle.

A motorist travelling northbound on Ormond Road, just north of Duffield/ Wingate Lake Boulevard was ejected from their vehicle and killed when they lost control during snowy, inclement weather and crossed the centerline hitting a southbound vehicle head-on.

A motorist travelling westbound on Indianwood Road, 400 feet east of Knollwood drive was killed when they loss control of their vehicle and left the road hitting a utility pole. Speed to fast and alcohol was a factor in the crash.
A pedestrian in the eastbound lane of Drahner Road at Olive Street at night was hit and killed by an eastbound vehicle.
A motorist southbound on Pontiac Drive at Orchard Lake Road was killed when they failed to Stop at a red traffic light and hit a westbound vehicle and an eastbound vehicle.
A pedestrian was killed when they stepped into the path of a southbound vehicle on Union Lake Road at Cooley Lake Road.

At night a pedestrian was killed while standing next to their vehicle that was in the road without lights when they were hit by another vehicle on westbound Sleeth Road 200 feet east of Penarth Street.
A motorist riding a minibike westbound on Eight Mile Road was killed when they hit the side of an eastbound motorist’s vehicle that was turning left onto northbound Tuck Road.

A pedestrian was killed attempting to crossing Twelve Mile Road near Tessmer Court (west of Dequindre Road) when hit by a westbound vehicle knocked over the top and under a second vehicle and dragged approximately a quarter mile before being stopped.
A motorist travelling eastbound on South Holly Road, west of Hickory Ridge Road was killed when they ran off the road hitting a utility pole. It appeared that the driver was not wearing a seatbelt.
A motorcyclist travelling eastbound on Clarkston Road, east of Lakeview Road was killed when they loss control, crossed the centerline and hit a westbound vehicle head-on.

A motorist travelling westbound on Elizabeth Lake Road, east of Cooley Lake Road was killed when they ran off the road to the left crashing into five parked vehicles in a used car dealership. Investigators believe the driver suffered a medical condition prior to the crash.

A motorist travelling eastbound on Long Lake Road, 500 foot east of Nearbrook Road (west of Lahser Road) was killed when they lost control of their vehicle and ran off the road hitting a tree. Alcohol and high speeds appear to be factors in the crash.

A motorcyclist travelling eastbound on Big Beaver Road, 266 feet east of Daley Road (east of Rochester Road) was killed when they lost control and ran off the road hitting the curb and a traffic sign.
A motorist was killed on westbound Walton Boulevard at Opdyke Road when they made a left turn failing to yield to an eastbound through vehicle.
A motorcyclist travelling westbound on 9 Mile Road at Pontiac Trail was killed when they hit an eastbound motorists turning left in front of them.
A motorist being chased by police ran a red light at the intersection of Baldwin Road and Waldon Road and hit another vehicle killing the driver.
A motorcyclist travelling eastbound on Grange Hall Road, west of Riviera Shores Drive was killed when they lost control in a curve and ran off the road hitting a guardrail.
A motorist southbound on Beck Road at Twelve Mile Road made a left turn and was hit by a northbound vehicle. A passenger in the left turning vehicle was killed.
A motorcyclist travelling westbound on Hickory Grove Road was killed when they hit a vehicle that was northbound on Chickering Lane crossing Hickory Grove Road.
A motorist travelling eastbound on Walton Boulevard east of Meinrad Drive was killed when they ran off the road hitting a utility pole, a tree, a fence and another utility pole.

A motorist travelling southbound on Dixie Highway, near Belford Road was killed when they entered the northbound lanes and hit a semi-truck head-on. Crash may have been intentional and is being investigated.
A motorist on eastbound Ten Mile Road at Lahser Road disregarded a traffic signal and hit a southbound vehicle killing the driver and forcing it into a fuel station where it hit a third vehicle.
A motorist westbound on Maple Road at Stephenson Highway failed to stop at a red traffic light and hit a southbound vehicle killing the driver.
A motorist westbound on Mann Road at Clintonville Road disregarded the Stop sign and was hit by a southbound vehicle. A passenger in the westbound vehicle was killed.

A motorist northbound on Livernois Road at Wattles Road ran through a red signal indication and hit a westbound turning vehicle that had a left turn green arrow indication. A passenger in the westbound vehicle was killed.
A pedestrian crossing at the intersection of Airport Road at Tubbs Road from east to west at night was hit by a northbound vehicle. The pedestrian died a few days later from their injuries.

A commercial garbage truck became disabled in the roadway westbound on Ray Road 500 feet west of Oxford Road with flashers activated. Another westbound vehicle crashed into the rear of the truck killing the driver and one of their passengers.

A pedestrian crossing Elizabeth Lake Road 25 feet west of Preston Road from north to south at night was hit and killed by a westbound vehicle. The motorist fled the scene with the vehicle which was later recovered after it was set on fire.
A motorist travelling eastbound on Romeo Road near Townsend Road attempting to pass slower moving vehicles in a marked no passing zone hit a westbound vehicle head-on killing the driver.

A motorist travelling westbound on Cooley Lake Road, 200 feet west of Glade Street was killed when they crossed the centerline and ran off the road to the left crashing into a traffic sign and a tree. Investigators believe the driver may have suffered a medical condition prior to the crash.
A motorist travelling northbound on South Hill Road, 1320 feet south of Dawson Road in the curve was killed when they ran off the road hitting a tree causing the vehicle to catch fire.
A pedestrian crossing Greenfield Road south of 11 Mile Road from west to east at night was hit by a southbound vehicle. The pedestrian died a few days later from their injuries.
A motorist travelling westbound on Oakwood Road 500 feet east of Coats Road was killed when they ran off the road to the right crashing into several trees before overturning.
A motorist on eastbound Long Lake Road at Coolidge Highway was killed when they disregarded a traffic signal and hit two southbound vehicles, overturning their vehicle.
A pedestrian was killed when crossing Opdyke Road 300 feet south of Hempstead Road from east to west at night when hit by a southbound vehicle.
A motorcyclist travelling eastbound on Cooley Lake Road 750 east of King Arms Road crossed the centerline and hit a westbound vehicle head-on killing the driver.
A pedestrian on eastbound Ten Mile Road (I-696 Service Drive) east of Campbell Road near Huron Street at night was hit and killed by an eastbound vehicle.
A motorcyclist travelling northbound on Hadley Road, 3960 feet south of Oak Hill Road was killed when they loss control, hit two mailboxes and fell from the vehicle.

A motorist travelling southbound on Opdyke Road, near Heatherwood Lane/Knollwood Road was killed when they entered the northbound lanes and hit a northbound gravel hauler semi-truck head-on. The southbound vehicle also hit another northbound vehicle.
A motorist was killed when two vehicles travelling on White Lake Road, approximately 3,300 feet east of Teggerdine Road collided in a head-on crash. The driver at fault has not been determined.
A motorist travelling westbound on Ten Mile Road, 1320 Feet west of Milford Road was killed when they crossed the centerline and hit an eastbound vehicle head-on.

A passenger from a vehicle involved in an earlier crash at this same intersection was killed when they attempted to cross outside the crosswalk on Twelve Mile (EB) Road at Haggerty Road, and was struck by another vehicle.
A motorist travelling westbound on Ten Mile Road, 400 Feet east of Stoney Croft Road was killed when they crossed into the eastbound lanes and hit an eastbound vehicle head-on.

A motorist travelling southbound on Clintonville Road, 500 feet north of Waldon Road was killed when lost control, crossed the centerline, left the roadway striking a boulder. Alcohol was a factor in the crash.

A motorist travelling eastbound on Walton Boulevard at Clintonville Road was killed when left the roadway, struck a utility pole and two trees before coming to rest against a building and the vehicle becoming engulfed in flames.

A motorcyclist travelling westbound on Oakley Park Road, near Sutton Lane in the curve was killed when they lost control and ran off the road. Speed appears to be the contributing factor. A passenger was reported as an “A” injury.

A motorists travelling eastbound on Hatchery Road, west of Edmore Road was killed when they lost control, crossed the centerline, hit a construction solar-powered trailer mounted arrow board and a fence before rolling over into the river. Alcohol may have been a factor in the crash.

A motorcyclist travelling southbound on Ormond Road, at night, a half-mile south of French Road was killed when they hit a deer and lost control. A southbound motorist ran over the body and fled the scene.
A motorist travelling northbound on John R Road at E Whitcomb Avenue, was killed when they went through a red light and hit an eastbound vehicle at a high rate of speed.

A motorcyclist with passenger on eastbound on Grand River Avenue at Wixom Road was stop for the traffic signal when they were rear-ended and push into the vehicle in front of them. The motorcycle passenger was killed.
A motorcyclist travelling southbound on Ormond Road south of Duffield Road was killed when they were hit by a northbound motorist turning left into the White Lake Supermarket.
A motorist travelling southbound on Dequindre Road at Romeo Road, ran the Stop sign and hit a westbound vehicle causing it to rollover killing the driver.

A motorist travelling westbound on Oakley Park Road, near Sutton Lane in the curve was killed when they lost control and ran off the road, hit a ditch, two traffic signs and a tree. It has been reported, the man may have suffered a medical emergency prior to the crash.

A motorist travelling southbound on Southfield Road at Twelve Mile Road, was killed when they hit a stopped vehicle in the right turn lane at a high rate of speed, then continued through the intersection hitting a sign, then a guardrail on private property, and then a building.

A motorists travelling northbound on Joslyn Road, south of Judah Road was killed when they lost control of the vehicle, crossed the centerline, struck a dirt embankment and rolled over three times. No seat belt was used.

A motorist travelling westbound on Avon Road, 300 Feet east of Glouchester Road (east of Adams Road) at night, hit and killed a pedestrian. This was a hit and run the pedestrian was discovered in a ditch the next morning.
A motorist travelling westbound on Seymour Lake Road, 1000 Feet west of Perry Lake Road was killed when they crossed the centerline and hit an eastbound vehicle head-on.
A motorist travelling westbound on West Maple Road at Halsted Road, rear-ended a westbound moped vehicle killing the driver. Alcohol and drugs were a factor in the crash.
A motorist travelling eastbound on Ray Road at Hosner Road, was killed when they left the roadway and hit a tree. Alcohol was a factor in the crash.

A motorist travelling westbound on Clarkston Road, 200 feet west of Park Drive in the curve was killed when they lost control and ran off the road hitting a road sign and a tree. Speed appears to be the contributing factor.
A motorist travelling eastbound on Grange Hall Road, near Great Lakes Boulevard was killed when they rear-ended a vehicle that was slowing to make a left turn into a driveway.

A motorist travelling southbound on Odyke Road, approximately 750 feet north of Auburn Road crossed the centerline and collided with a northbound vehicle in a head-on crash. The drivers of both vehicles were killed.
A pedestrian was hit and killed by an eastbound vehicle when they were crossing Twelve Mile Road, east of Telegraph near the 12-Tel Mall traffic signal outside of the crosswalk.

A motorist travelling southbound on Dixie Highway, near Tindal Road was killed in a head-on collision with a northbound vehicle. Police believe one of the drivers lost control and crossed the centerline.

A motorist travelling southbound on South Commerce Road, 65 Feet north of Woodcreek Court was killed when they lost control on the snowy road, crossed the centerline and hit a northbound vehicle head-on.

A motorist travelling northbound on Dequindre Road, 100 Feet north of Clovelly Avenue was killed when they crossed the centerline and hit a southbound vehicle before continuing and hitting a house. The driver experienced a medical emergency and passed out before the crash.
A pedestrian was hit and killed by an eastbound vehicle when they were crossing Twelve Mile Road, west of Dequindre Road in the City of Madison Heights. This was a hit-and-run crash.

The passenger in a motorist’s vehicle travelling westbound on Lakeville Road, 2,500 feet west of Hosner Road, in Addison Township, was killed when a motorist travelling eastbound loss control, crossed the centerline, and hit them head-on. Alcohol was a contributing factor in the crash.

A motorist travelling westbound on Elizabeth Lake Park Road, 100 feet west of Hickory Lane in the curve was killed when they lost control, crossed the centerline, and ran off the road came back onto the road and was hit by an eastbound vehicle. Alcohol was a contributing factor in the crash.

A motorist travelling eastbound on Pontiac Trail, just east of Halsted Road was killed when a motorist travelling westbound crossed the centerline causing a head-on collision. Witnesses at the scene stated the westbound motorist was passing in a no passing zone.

On Pontiac Trail, 1500 feet south of 11 Mile Road, a construction worker was killed when a work vehicle involved in the work zone paving operation backed up over the worker taking temperature measurements of the bituminous pavement being placed.

A motorist travelling eastbound on South Boulevard, 350 feet east of Fredmoor Drive lost control, crossed the centerline, and ran off the road into a ditch, went airborne and struck a utility pole. A passenger in the vehicle was killed. Alcohol and drugs were a contributing factor in the crash.

A motorcyclist travelling westbound on Elizabeth Lake Road, 650 feet northwest of Oxbow Lake Road in the curve was killed when they lost control and ran off the road. Speed appears to be the contributing factor. Alcohol was a contributing factor in the crash.
A motorcyclist travelling southbound on Williams Lake Road, 1200 feet north of M-59 (Highland Road) was killed when they lost control, ran off the road and hit a chevron sign.

A motorist travelling Eastbound on Mountain View Road at Williams Lake Road, failed to yield the right of way after stopping and was hit by a southbound motorist. A passenger in the vehicle that failed to yield was killed.
A motorist travelling southbound on Scott Lake Road, 20 feet north of Peerless Street was killed when they lost control, ran off the road and hit a tree.

A motorist travelling eastbound on Maple Road, 900 feet west of Golfview Road was killed when they crossed the centerline causing a head-on collision with a westbound vehicle. Drugs were a contributing factor.
A motorist travelling northbound on Southfield Road, 50 feet south of Lincoln Road was killed when they rear-ended a stopped without slowing down. Alcohol was a contributing factor in the crash.
A motorist travelling eastbound on Elizabeth Lake Road, 75 feet west of Crescent Lake Road turned left into a business driveway and was hit by a westbound motorcyclist that died from their injuries.

A motorcyclist’s passenger was killed when they were hit from behind on eastbound Clark Road as they were slowing down to make a right turn onto Big Lake Road. The motorist that hit them was reported to be distracted.

A motorist travelling northbound on Milford Road, about a half-mile south of Davisburg Road was killed when they lost control, ran off the road and hit a guardrail, rolled over, ejecting himself from the vehicle. Alcohol and drugs were a contributing factor.

A motorist travelling eastbound on Oakwood Road, 500 feet west of Hadley Road was killed when they swerved right onto the shoulder, over corrected crossing the centerline, causing a head-on collision with a semi-truck.

A motorist travelling westbound on Clyde Road at Hickory Ridge Road, failed to yield the right of way after stopping and was hit by a northbound motorist. A passenger in the vehicle that failed to yield was killed.
A motorcyclist travelling southeasterly on Union Lake Road at Farnsworth Road, killed when they were passing a right turning vehicle and was hit by a vehicle making a left turn from Farnsworth Road.
A motorist travelling eastbound on Lakeville Road, 100 feet east of Grampian Road was killed when they ran off the road into a pond.
A motorist travelling eastbound on Walton Boulevard, 40 feet west of Texas Avenue was killed when they crossed the centerline sideswiping one vehicle and then hitting a westbound vehicle head-on.
A motorist travelling westbound on E Holly Road, 913 feet west of Tucker Road with two passengers was killed when they ran off the road rolling their vehicle which caught on fire.
A pedestrian was killed by a southbound vehicle when they were crossing Cass Lake Road, 350 feet south of Elizabeth Lake Road. Alcohol was a contributing factor in the crash.

A motorist travelling eastbound on Grange Hall Road, near Joann Street was killed when they lost control of their vehicle, crossed the centerline causing a head-on collision with a westbound vehicle. The driver may have suffered a medical condition before the crash.
A motorist westbound on Coach Lamp Road at Rochester Road, made a left turn and was hit by a northbound vehicle. The driver of the left turning vehicle died 20 days later from their injuries.

A motorist travelling northbound on Sashabaw Road, 150 feet north of Meigs Avenue had an apparent medical problem and ran off the road into a fire hydrant. The motorist died from their medical problem.

A motorist travelling westbound on General Motors Road, 150 feet east of Martindale Road was killed when they lost control in slushy road conditions, crossed the centerline and were hit by an eastbound vehicle.
A motorist travelling at a high rate of speed on Grange Hall Road, lost control at the intersection of Foxwood Trail, left the road and hit a tree killing the passenger in their vehicle.

A motorist travelling northbound on Clintonville Road, 100 feet north of Fay Street during dark and wet conditions hit a pedestrian in a wheelchair that was being push by another pedestrian. The motorist fled the scene. The pedestrian in the wheelchair died from the injuries on 04/08/19.

A motorist travelling eastbound on Seymour Lake Road, crossed the centerline to avoid a rear-end collision with a vehicle turning left onto Dunlap Road and hit a westbound vehicle head-on, killing the driver.
A motorist travelling westbound on Commerce Road, hit and killed a pedestrian crossing the road from north to south at Greenlawn Avenue.
A motorcyclist travelling westbound on Stoney Creek Road, west of Rochester Road was killed when a wild turkey hit him in the chest causing him to lose control, run-off the road hitting a guardrail.

A motorist travelling northbound on Andersonville Road, 1320 feet south of Clark Road was killed when they lost control, crossed the centerline and ran off the road hitting a tree, rolling the vehicle over. Alcohol was a factor in the crash.

A motorist travelling westbound on Hickory Grove Road, 100 feet west of Orange Lake Drive was killed when they lost control, crossed the centerline, ran off the road and hit a tree. Alcohol was a contributing factor in the crash.

A motorcyclist with passenger at the intersection of Hospital Road and Elizabeth Lake Road were both killed. The motorcyclist was southbound when a northbound motorist made a left turn causing the collision.

A motorist travelling northwesterly on Heathfield Road, 250 feet southeasterly of Berkshire Drive was killed including two passengers when they suffered a seizure, loss control, ran off road and hit a tree. A third passenger suffered an A injury.

A motorist travelling westbound on Big Beaver Road, 974 feet west of Morel Boulevard, crossed the center median, striking two trees and entering the eastbound lanes where they hit a vehicle head-on killing the driver.

A motorist travelling westbound on Pontiac Trail, 240 feet west of Ward Road, crossed the centerline sideswiping an eastbound vehicle and then hitting another westbound vehicle head-on. A passenger in the vehicle that crossed the centerline was killed. The driver may have suffered a medical emergency prior to the crash.
Two pedestrians were killed while crossing Milford Road, 250 feet north of Livingston Road (Non in marked cross walk) when they were hit by a southbound vehicle.
column6: Yes - UD 10 does not show K, Police said one K, Keller says to K's

column2: A pedestrian was killed while walking in Greenfield Road, 500 feet north of Nine Mile Road when they were hit by a northbound vehicle at night.
A pedestrian was killed while walking in Greenfield Road, 570 feet south of Nine Mile Road when they were hit by a northbound vehicle at night. Drugs and alcohol may have been factors in the crash.

A motorist travelling westbound on Ten Mile Road (E Lake St), 75 feet west of Lyon Boulevard was killed when they lost control, hit a curb, mailbox, boulders, and three parked vehicles, rolling the vehicle over.
A motorist travelling northbound on John R Road, 600 feet south of Big Beaver Road was killed when they made a left turn and were hit by a southbound vehicle.

A motorist travelling eastbound on Oakwood Road, 500 feet west of Barber Road was killed when they lost control, crossed the centerline, ran off the road and hit a tree. Alcohol was a contributing factor in the crash.
Two pedestrians were killed while crossing Twelve Mile Road, near Parkhill Street when they were hit by a vehicle.

A motorist travelling northbound on Dixie Highway, 100 feet south of Buckell Lake Road ran off the road into a ditch. When officers responded to the scene the motorist stripped naked and began running in the lanes of traffic into the side of a southbound vehicle. They died later from their injuries.
A pedestrian was killed while crossing Ten Mile Road, in a construction work zone near Santa Barbara Street when they were hit by a vehicle that did not stop.
A westbound Dump Truck on Long Lake Road, near West Wabeek Lake Drive hit a vehicle killing the driver.

A motorist travelling on Seymour Lake Road near Perry Lake Road was killed when they attempted to pass a least two vehicles on wet pavement and lost control, driving off the road, over the curb, and into a marshy area, rolling the vehicle over. The driver was not wearing a seatbelt and was ejected, and the vehicle landed partly on top of them. Alcohol is believed to be a factor in the crash.
A pedestrian was killed while walking in Grand River Avenue, 75 feet east of Asbury Hill Drive when they were hit by an eastbound vehicle at night.
A pedestrian was killed while crossing Dequindre Road, just north of Big Beaver Road when they were hit by a northbound vehicle that did not stop.
A pedestrian was killed while crossing Drahner Road, at Brookside Court when they were hit by a westbound vehicle at night.
A motorist travelling northbound on Hickory Ridge Road, between Sackner Road and Pellett Drive was killed when they lost control and crossed the centerline hitting another vehicle head-on.

A driver and passenger on a snowmobile travelling northbound on N Eston Road, 50 feet north of N Whipple Lake Road hit a stopped snowmobile. The driver and passenger were ejected from the snowmobile, the passenger was killed.
The operator of a motorized mobility wheel chair was killed when crossing John R Road, 75 feet south of Isabell Street in dark and unlighted conditions when hit by a northbound vehicle.

A motorist travelling northbound on Dixie Highway, 40 feet south of Cedar Valley Drive made a U-turn and was hit by a southbound gravel hauler causing it to roll over. The driver of the gravel hauler died 11 days later from injuries suffered in the crash.

A motorist travelling southbound on John R Road, 100 feet south of Nancy Bostick Drive/Orpington Drive, for unknow reasons swerved over the centerline and was hit on the passenger side by a northbound vehicle, then rolled over into the grass right of way. The northbound vehicle was then hit by another northbound vehicle and then a second northbound vehicle. A passenger in the vehicle that crossed the centerline was killed.

A motorist travelling southbound on Middlebelt Road, 500 feet south of Shore Hill Drive was killed when they crossed the centerline and hit a northbound vehicle in a head-on collision possible due to a medical condition.

A motorist travelling eastbound on Walnut Lake Road approaching Franklin Road at a high rate of speed was killed when they continued through the traffic signal at the T-intersection into a series of trees. The cause of the crash was a medical condition (heart attack).
A motorist travelling westbound on Grange Hall Road, approximately 600 feet east of Joann Street was killed when they lost control crossing the centerline where they were hit by a semi-truck.

A motorist in a police pursuit chase travelling southbound on Greenfield Road at Eleven Mile Road, was killed when they hit another vehicle in the intersection then a street name sign and a traffic signal pole.

An eastbound pedestrian crossing Gilbert Lake Rd at Quarton Rd in a marked crosswalk was struck and killed by a motorist turning from westbound Quarton Rd onto Gilbert Lake Rd.  Motorist indicated that they did not see the pedestrian in the crosswalk until after an eastbound vehicle cleared the intersection and the left turn was in progress.

A motorcyclist with passenger traveling eastbound on Bogie Lake Rd approx. 400’ west of Sugden Lake Rd crossed over the centerline when they were unable to slow for a curve.  They struck a northbound motorist.  Both the motorcyclist and passenger were ejected from the motorcycle.  The motorcyclist (driver) was killed.

A motorcyclist travelling westbound on State Street at North Oxford Road, was killed when they failed to stop for the Stop sign, losing control hitting the curb on the west side of the road. Drugs and alcohol were contributing factors in the crash.

A motorcyclist travelling northbound on Baldwin Road at Oakwood Road, was killed when they failed to stop for the Stop sign, crashing into a westbound vehicle making a left turn. Alcohol was contributing factor in the crash.
A motorist travelling northbound on Williams Lake Road, approximately 375 feet south of Oakland Manor Drive was killed when a tree fell crushing the vehicle.

A bicyclist travelling southbound on Middlebelt Road at Liberty Street, was struck.  The bicyclist struck the windshield of the motorist and ended up many feet south of Liberty Street.  The bicyclist was killed.

A motorist travelling eastbound on Parkdale Road turning left onto Wyngate Drive was struck on the rear passenger side by a motorist travelling westbound on Parkdale Road.  The struck vehicle was split into two sections.  An unrestrained passenger in the struck vehicle was killed.
A pedestrian crossing Maple Road at John R Road in the crosswalk was killed when struck by a westbound vehicle that had the green signal indication.

A motorist and front seat passenger traveling southbound on Dequindre Road, south of Square Lake Road at a high rate of speed struck another southbound vehicle from behind then veered off the roadway struck a fire hydrant and a series of trees.  The unrestrained front passenger was killed.

A motorist traveling eastbound on Nine Mile Road, 1050’ west of Currie Road was traveling at a high rate of speed when they lost control of the vehicle striking a mailbox then several trees.  The unrestrained driver was killed.

A motorist traveling eastbound on Silver Lake Road, 1320’ east of Dixboro Road failed to navigate a curve, left the roadway, struck a tree and was killed.  The motorist was listed to be fatigued or asleep at the time of the crash.
A motorist exiting a business driveway on Sashabaw Road, approximately 100’ north of Maybee Road struck and killed a pedestrian who was within a sidewalk crossing the driveway
column6: Yes does not have driveway drawin the same as the one that was given in distance from Maybee Rd.

column2: A motorist with passenger was driving an off-road vehicle (ATV) on Oakwood Road approximately 200’ east of Dena Marie Drive struck a rock and overturned the ATV.  A few days after the crash, the unhelmeted passenger was killed (from injuries related to the crash).  Alcohol was listed as a contributing factor.

A motorist was making a left turn from northbound Greenfield Road onto Stratford Drive.  The motorist turned across the path of a southbound motorcyclist.  The motorcyclist struck the side of the motorist’s vehicle. The motorcyclist was killed.

A motorcyclist with a passenger was travelling northbound on Dixie Highway south of Rattalee Lake Road when they struck a vehicle exiting a business heading eastbound on Rattalee Lake Road.  The driver of the motorcycle was killed.  Alcohol use was indicated but not listed as a contributing factor.

An unrestrained westbound motorist leaving a signalized business drive struck a northbound unrestrained motorist on Greenfield Road approximately 350’ north of Northland Drive.   The unrestrained westbound motorist was killed.

A southbound motorist struck another motorist who was stopped for a red light at the northern leg of the intersection of Airport Road and Hatchery Road.  The driver of the southbound vehicle was killed.

A motorcyclist was struck on Oakwood Road approximately 200’ west of Tonda Dr when the motorcyclist crossed over the centerline of a curve and was struck by an oncoming motorist.  The motorcyclist was killed.

A motorist was travelling westbound on Cooley Lake Road at Hiller Road.  While attempting to make a left turn onto Hiller Road, the westbound motorist struck an eastbound motorist on Cooley Lake Rd.  The eastbound motorist was killed.

A southbound motorcyclist lost control of his motorcycle on Sashabaw Road north of Island Park Drive crossing over the centerline and striking the guardrail.  The motorcyclist then slid across the oncoming lane of traffic coming to a rest in the southbound lane of Sashabaw Road.  The motorcyclist was killed.

A motorist traveling southbound on Lockhaven Road, at Willow Road may have suffered from an unknown medical emergency and proceeded to initiate an eastbound left turn into an oncoming vehicle on Willow Road.  It is unknown if the southbound motorist was restrained in the vehicle.  The southbound motorist was pronounced dead after being admitted to a local hospital.

Two pedestrians were crossing Pontiac Lake Road west of Village Green Lane when one pedestrian was struck by an eastbound motorist.  The pedestrians were not crossing in marked crosswalk.  The crash occurred at night. The location was noted to have limited lighting and it was raining.  The struck pedestrian was killed.
An eastbound motorist on Tienken Road struck a southbound pedestrian 40 feet east of Clear Creek Drive.  The pedestrian was in or near the marked crosswalk.  The pedestrian was killed.

A motorist traveling east on East Holly Road struck a motorist traveling south on Tindall Road.  The southbound motorist was unrestrained as the vehicle was not equipped.  The southbound motorist was killed.
A southbound motorist on Napier Road approximately 780 feet south of Twelve Mile Road when left of center for unknown reasons and struck a tree.  The motorist was killed.

A southbound motorist on Livernois Road struck two pedestrians crossing at westbound Big Beaver Road.  The pedestrians were in a marked crosswalk.  The pedestrians were crossing Livernois Road when southbound Livernois Road had a green indication.  One pedestrian was killed.
A westbound motorist on Pontiac Trail was struck by an eastbound motorist on Silver Lake Road.  The westbound motorist was killed.

A southbound motorist on Livernois Road making a left turn onto Drexelgate Parkway struck a southbound pedestrian crossing Drexelgate Parkway.  The pedestrian was in a marked crosswalk.  The pedestrian was killed.
A pedestrian laying in the eastbound lane of South Boulevard just east of Old Chatham Drive was struck by an eastbound motorist.  The pedestrian was killed.

A westbound motorist in the center left turn lane was turning left from Twelve Mile Road onto Murray Crescent Road was struck from behind by a second westbound motorist for an unknown reason.  The second motorist was later pronounced dead at the hospital.

A westbound motorist on Twelve Mile Road just west of Halstead Road struck a pedestrian in the northern most lane of Twelve Mile Road.  The pedestrian was not located in a marked crosswalk.  Alcohol was listed as a contributing factor for the pedestrian that was struck and killed.

A motorist was southbound on Southfield Road north of Webster Road when they struck another southbound motorist, struck a curb and rolled their vehicle several times.  The motorist had to be extricated from the vehicle.  The motorist was killed.  Alcohol was listed as a contributing factor.

A motorist was southbound on Kensington Road north of E. Long Lake Road when they proceeded to go left of center though a red traffic signal indication and struck a motorist westbound on E. Long Lake Road.  Both vehicles left the roadway striking a utility pole.  The southbound motorist was traveling at a high rate of speed while eluding a police unit.  The southbound motorist was later pronounced dead at a local hospital.
A motorist was southbound on Lake George Road approximately 800’ north of Drahner Road when they encountered icy conditions, left the roadway and struck a tree.  The motorist was killed.

A front end loader with bucket was exiting the Auburn Hills DPW yard onto eastbound Brown Road approximately 500’ west of Giddings Road when the bucket went left of center striking a westbound motorist.  The westbound motorist was killed.

A pedestrian was walking in the westbound lane of Indianwood Road east of Oneida Trail when they were stuck and killed by a westbound motorist.  The pedestrian was not in a marked pedestrian crossing.

An unhelmeted motorcyclist and unhelmeted passenger were traveling northeast on Williams Lake Road when they ran a red light and struck a motorist westbound on Pontiac Lake Road.  Both the motorcyclist and passenger were transported to a local hospital were the motorcyclist died from injuries sustained in the crash.

A motorist was driving southbound on Branford Drive approximately 500’ NE of Berwick Drive at a high rate of speed.  The motorist lost control, crossed the centerline struck a rock and trees.  An unrestrained rear seat passenger was killed.

A motorist was traveling eastbound on Maple Road approaching Halstead Road crossed over the centerline and struck a signpost and utility pole.  A front passenger was required to be extricated from the vehicle (by first responders) and later died at a local hospital.  Alcohol use by the driver was suspected.

A motorcyclist was traveling southbound on Baldwin Road approximately 1050’ north of Clarkston Road when they lost control of the motorcycle in a curve.  The motorcyclist was thrown from the motorcycle and was killed.
A motorcyclist was westbound on Pontiac Trail and was struck by an eastbound motorist turning left onto northbound Beck Road.  The motorcyclist was killed.

A motorist was traveling southwest on Lake Angelus Road approximately 150” northeast of Heatherstone Drive at a speed too fast for roadway conditions and lost control of the vehicle.  The vehicle struck a tree.  The motorist was killed

An unhelmeted motorcyclist was northbound on Dixie Highway approximately 1,320 feet north of Gail Drive when they lost control of the motorcycle existed to the left of the roadway.  The motorcyclist was killed.
An unhelmeted motorcyclist was traveling southbound on Dixie Highway and was struck by a northbound motorist turning left onto Hutchinson Road.  The motorcyclist was killed.
An unhelmeted motorcyclist was traveling southbound on Clarkston Road just north of Newport Drive when the left the roadway to the right when entering a curve.  The motorcyclist was killed.
A motorist was northbound on Adams Road was turning left onto westbound Auburn Road.  The northbound motorist turned in front of a southbound motorist.  The northbound motorist was killed.
A pedestrian was walking eastbound on Kier Road 1000 feet west of Ellis Road was struck by a westbound motorist.  The pedestrian was killed.

A motorist was northbound on Adams Road north of Baypoint Street when they departed the roadway to the right.  The vehicle overturned and came to rest on the driver’s side.  The motorist was killed.  Alcohol and drugs were listed as contributing factors.

A motorist was westbound on Avon Road turning left onto southbound Adams Road when they were struck by a northbound Adams Road motorist.  The northbound motorist disregarded the traffic signal.  The westbound motorist was killed.
A motorist was westbound on Wattles Road turning northbound onto Kensington Road when they lost control and left the roadway into roadside trees.  The motorist was killed.
A pedestrian was walking westbound on 12 Mile Road 70 feet west of Balmoral Way was struck by a eastbound motorist.  The pedestrian was killed.
A motorcyclist was southbound on Harvey Lake Road 800 feet south of Wardlow Road when they struck a deer, lost control and struck a northbound vehicle.  The motorcyclist was killed.
A bicyclist was riding northbound on Opdyke Road at Hempstead Road was struck by a northbound motorist.  The bicyclist was killed.

A motorist was westbound on Pontiac Trail 50 feet east of Willow Lane when they ran off the road and struck a tree. The motorist was killed. The motorist was not wear a seatbelt. Alcohol and drugs were listed as contributing factors.
A motorist was northbound on Novi Road 200 feet north of Genmar when they lost control in icy conditions and went left of center. They were struck by a southbound vehicle. The motorist was killed.

A bicyclist was northbound crossing 12 Mile Road 15 feet west of Stephenson Highway.  They disregarded the traffic control. They were struck by a westbound motorist.  The bicyclist was killed. Alcohol was listed as contributing factor for the motorist.
A motorist was eastbound on Grange Hall Road 1,320 feet east of Perryville Road when they ran off the road and struck a tree. The motorist was killed.
A pedestrian in the southbound lane of Rochester Road 50 feet south of Whims Road  was stuck and killed by a southbound motorist.  Alcohol was listed as contributing factor for the pedestrian.
A motorist was northbound on Duck Lake Road was turning left onto westbound Cooley Lake Road.  The northbound motorist turned in front of a eastbound motorist.  The northbound motorist was killed.

A motorist was traveling northbound on Adams Road south of Silverbell Road crossed over the centerline and struck a southbound vehicle. The northbound motorist was killed. Drugs and alcohol use by the driver was suspected.

A motorist was traveling southbound on Bogie Lake Road south of Cedar Island Road crossed over the centerline and struck a northbound vehicle. The southbound motorist was killed. Alcohol use by the driver was suspected.

A motorist traveling eastbound on Hatchery Road east of Williams Lake Road may have suffered from an unknown medical emergency crossed left of center and struck a mailbox. The motorist was pronounced dead after being admitted to a local hospital. * Reclassified as PDO, as the fatality was attributed to the medical emergency not the crash.

A motorist was driving eastbound on Stony Creek Road approaching Lake George Road at a high rate of speed. The motorist failed to stop at the stop sign, crossed Lake George, left the roadway, and struck a tree.  The motorist was killed.

A motorist traveling westbound on Pontiac Lake Road approximately 500’ west of Oak Pointe Drive may have suffered from an unknown medical emergency drove off the roadway to the right and struck a tree. The motorist was pronounced dead after being admitted to a local hospital.      * Reclassified as PDO, as the fatality was attributed to the medical emergency not the crash.

A motorist was traveling southbound on Bogie Lake Road between the north and south intersections of Young Road crossed over the centerline side-swiped two northbound vehicle and struck a third head-on. The third northbound motorist was killed. Drug use by the southbound driver was suspected.

A motorist was driving eastbound on Maple Road approaching Decker Road and failed to stop at the red signal. The eastbound motorist struck a southbound vehicle, which struck a northbound vehicle, which struck a stationary westbound vehicle. The passenger in the right rear seat of the northbound vehicle was killed.
A motorist was driving westbound on Predmore Road approaching Rochester Road and failed to stop at the stop sign. The motorist struck a northbound vehicle. The motorist was killed.

A motorist was traveling southbound on Middlebelt Road between the north of 12 Mile Road crossed over the centerline stuck three northbound vehicles head-on. The first northbound motorist was ejected from the vehicle and killed.

A southbound motorist was on North Holly Road attempting to turning left onto eastbound Belford Road.  The southbound motorist turned in front of a northbound motorcycle.  The northbound motorist was killed.
A go cart was driving southbound exiting a private drive onto Hatchery Road and failed to yield to westbound traffic. The go cart was struck by a westbound vehicle. The go cart driver was killed.
A pedestrian was attempting to cross from the south to the north side of Maple Road 200 feet east of Lahser Road. The pedestrian was stuck and killed by an eastbound motorist.

A motorist was traveling southbound on Dixie Highway north of Grange Hall Road. They ran off the road to right, over-corrected, crossed over the centerline and struck a northbound vehicle. The southbound motorist was unrestrained, they were ejected from the vehicle and killed.

A northbound motorist was attempting to turn left from Livernois Road onto Maple Road. They proceeded though a red signal to complete the turn. They were stuck by a west bound vehicle. The northbound motorist was killed.
A motorist was traveling northbound on Southfield Road south of 12 Mile Road. They crossed over the center lane and struck a southbound vehicle. The northbound motorist was killed.

A motorist was traveling westbound on Davisburg Road west of Eagle Road at a high rate of speed. They ran off the roadway to the left, struck a tree, and were killed. An eastbound motorist struck debris from the crash that was thrown into the roadway.
A motorist was traveling westbound on 14 Mile Road east of John R Road. They crossed over the center lane and struck an eastbound vehicle. The eastbound motorist was killed.

A pedestrian was attempting to cross from the west to the east side of Fransworth Road 500 feet south of Union Lake Road. The pedestrian was struck and killed by a northbound motorist.  The pedestrian was not in a marked crosswalk.
A motorist was traveling eastbound on Oak Hill Road west of Dartmouth Road. They went straight across the T intersection, struck a tree, and were killed. The driver was not wearing a seatbelt.

A motorist was traveling eastbound on Cooley Lake Road 150’ east of Long Lane. They ran off the roadway to the left, struck a concrete pillar, rolled over, and were killed. The driver was not wearing a seatbelt. Alcohol was suspected to be involved

A motorist was traveling northbound on Ormond Road 200’ south of Oakguard Drive. They lost control of their motorcycle and were thrown to the ground. They struck their head and were killed. The driver was not wearing a helmet.
A motorist was traveling westbound and ran over a ped in the road.
A motorist was traveling eastbound on Commerce Rd turning left into Marcello Dr.  They failed to yield the right of way to a motorcycle.

A motorist was travelling northbound on Baldwin Road. They attempted to turn left onto westbound Hummer Lake Road. They struck and killed a southbound motorcyclist. The motorcyclist was not wearing a helmet.

A motorcyclist was stopped on northbound Wixom Road attempting to turn left on to westbound Stratford Villa Way.  They were struck by northbound vehicle. The driver of the motorcycle was killed. They were not wearing a helmet.
A motorist was travelling eastbound on Long Lake Road. They disregarded the red traffic signal at Rochester Road. They struck a northbound vehicle. A passenger in the eastbound vehicle was killed.

A motorcyclist was travelling southbound on Sashabaw Road just south of Fowler Drive. They crossed left of center, struck a northbound vehicle, and fell off the motorcycle. They were then struck and killed by another northbound vehicle.
A motorist was travelling westbound on Normandale Street. They were attempting to turn onto Lahser Road. They field to yield to a northbound bus. A passenger in the westbound vehicle was killed.

A motorist was travelling eastbound on Walton Boulevard 400 feet west of Sashabaw Road. They struck a bicyclist crossing from the north to the south side of the road. The bicyclist was killed. The bicyclist was not wearing a helmet.

A motorist was travelling westbound on White Lake Road 400 feet west of Ormond Road. They crossed left of center, went off the road, and struck a road sign, a fence, and group of trees. The driver was killed.

A volunteer fire fighter was travelling northbound on Crooks Road with emergency lights and siren on. The proceed through the red traffic signal at Maple Road. They struck a westbound vehicle. A passenger in the westbound vehicle was killed.
A motorcyclist was traveling southbound on John R Road. They struck stopped southbound vehicle waiting at the signal to turn left onto Niagara Drive. The driver of the motorcycle was killed.

A motorist was travelling southbound at the first turn around on Long Lake Road west of Livernois Road. They were attempting to cross eastbound Long Lake Road and enter the parking lot to the south. They field to yield to and were stuck by an eastbound vehicle. The southbound driver was killed.
A pedestrian was attempting to cross from the northside to the southside of Maple Road 30’ west of Langford Street. They were struck and killed by an eastbound vehicle.

A motorcyclist was attempting to turn left from southbound Opdyke Road to eastbound Pontiac Road. The signal turned red and they tried to complete the turn and clear the intersection. They were struck by a northbound vehicle that ran the red signal. The driver of the motorcycle was killed.

A motorist was traveling southbound on Dequindre Road south of Big Beaver Road at a high rate of speed. They went airborne twice, lost control, skidded sideways and struck a curb. The vehicle rolled over multiple times ejecting and killing the driver. The driver was unrestrained.

A motorcyclist was travelling eastbound on Cooley Lake Road just east of Immensee Street. They lost control, crossed left of center, fell off the motorcycle, and were killed. The driver had a blood alcohol level of 0.12.

A motorist was attempting to leave the scene of a previous crash on Wixom Road just south of Saws Way. Travelling southbound they stuck a driver that had exited their vehicle to inspect the damage from the previous crash. They were dragged by the southbound vehicle for 30 to 40 feet and killed.

A motorist was travelling southbound on Southfield Road 100 feet north of Northwestern Highway. They lost control, went off the road, and struck a tree. The driver stated they were uninjured, but they were admitted to the hospital for a medical condition. The driver was pronounced dead at the hospital.

An ATV was travelling northbound on Jones Road south of Hatchery Road at a high rate of speed. The driver lost control and struck a tree. The two passengers were ejected from the vehicle. The driver and one of the passengers were killed. None of them were wearing helmets.

A motorist was traveling eastbound on Pontiac Trail 300 feet west of Hollingsworth Drive. They ran off the roadway to the right and struck a tree. The two passengers were killed. The driver and passengers were unrestrained. Alcohol was suspected to be involved.

A motorist was traveling northbound on Clarkston Road approximately 400 feet east of Clintonville Road. While travelling around a curve in the road they lost control, went left of center, and struck a tree. The driver was killed. The driver was unrestrained. The driver had a blood alcohol level of 0.10. Drug use was also suspected to be involved.
A motorist was travelling eastbound on Holly Road. They were attempting to turn onto Dixie Highway. They disregarded the stop sign. They were struck and killed by a northbound vehicle.

A Snowmobile was traveling westbound on Tucker Road 1000 feet north of Holly Road at a high rate of speed. They lost control of their Snowmobile while travelling around a curve and were thrown to the ground. They were killed. The driver was not wearing a helmet. Alcohol was suspected to be involved.
Rochester Rd
A motorist was travelling eastbound on Dutton Road 300 feet east of Bald Mountain Road. They crossed left of center and struck a westbound vehicle. The eastbound driver was killed.

A motorist was travelling eastbound on Long Lake Road 10 feet east of Northfield Parkway. They entered the westbound lanes, accelerated at a high rate of speed, and struck a westbound vehicle. Both drivers were killed.

A motorist was travelling southbound on Rochester Road north of Mead Road. They lost control due to icy road conditions, went left of center, and struck a northbound vehicle. The driver of the southbound vehicle was killed.

A motorist was travelling westbound on Walnut Lake Road east of Halsted Road. The driver may have fallen asleep. They lost control, ran off the road, and struck a tree. The passenger was unrestrained, they were killed.
A motorist was travelling westbound on Commerce Road east of Hickory Ridge Road. The driver ran off the road, struck a tree, and were killed. They were unrestrained.
A motorist was attempting to turn left from southbound John R Road into a private drive across from Ajax Drive. They failed to yield and struck a northbound motorcyclist. The motorcyclist was killed.
