A motorist was travelling eastbound on E Romeo Road approximately 800 feet east of Rochester Road, rapidly accelerating then departed the right side of the roadway striking a tree.  The motorist was killed.

A motorist was travelling southbound on Baldwin Road approximately 100 feet south of Seymour Lake Road. They crossed left of center and struck a northbound vehicle. The southbound driver was killed. They were unrestrained.

A pedestrian was attempting to cross Cooley Lake Road from the south to the north approximately 100 feet east of Hiller Road. The pedestrian failed to yield to oncoming traffic and was struck by a westbound vehicle. The pedestrian was killed. Alcohol was suspected as a contributing factor with the pedestrian.

A motorist was traveling eastbound on W. Tienken Road, approximately 35 feet east of Bridgestone Drive when they went left of center, corrected into the eastbound lane.  Then went left of center again departing the left side of the roadway striking a tree.  The motorist was killed.

A motorist was southbound on Orchard Lake Road approximately 100 feet south of Trestain Drive when they departed the divided roadway to the left crossing over the median striking several piece of construction equipment and three workers in a construction work zone.  One worker was killed.

A motorcyclist was traveling southbound on Crooks Road. They disregarded the red traffic signal at Long Lake Road. They struck an eastbound vehicle. The motorcyclist was thrown from the motorcycle and killed.

A motorist was traveling westbound on Pontiac Lake Road at a high rate of speed. Approximately 250 feet west of Williamsbury Drive they went left of center, over corrected, and ran off the road to the right. They struck a mailbox, then a utility pole, rolled, and struck a tree. The motorist was killed.

A motorist was traveling southbound on Airport Road approaching Pontiac Lake Road. They lost control of the vehicle and ran off the road to the right. They struck two utility poles, crossed Pontiac Lake Road, and struck a tree. The motorist was killed.

A southbound motorist was attempting to turn onto Silverbell Road from a driveway approximately 150 feet east of Lapeer Road. They failed to yield to westbound traffic and struck a garbage truck. The garbage truck rolled onto its side, struck a utility pole, then a wall. The driver of the garbage truck was killed.

A motorist was travelling northbound on Cooley Lake Road at a high rate of speed. Approximately 30 feet south of McDougal Drive they crossed left of center and struck a southbound vehicle. The eastbound driver was killed.

A motorist was travelling northbound on South Commerce Road south of Eddie Street. They lost control of the vehicle, ran off the road to the right, and struck a mailbox. The driver was pronounced died at the hospital. It is believed the driver suffered a medical emergency causing the crash.

A motorist was travelling eastbound on South Boulevard 600 feet east of Nichols Road. They went left of center into a ditch, struck a culvert, and overturned. The motorist was killed. They were unrestrained.
A motorist was traveling northbound on Grange Hall Road, they ran the Stop sign at Tripp Road. They were struck by an eastbound vehicle. The northbound driver was killed. They were unrestrained.

A motorist was traveling northbound on Opdyke Road just north of Pontiac Road. They stuck a pedestrian who was attempting to cross from the west side of the road to the east side midblock. It was dark, the area is unlit, and the pedestrian was wearing dark clothing. The pedestrian was killed.

A motorist was traveling southbound on Milford Road just north of Rowe Road. They struck and killed a bicyclist traveling southbound. It was dark, the area is unlit, and the bicyclist was wearing dark clothing. The bicyclist was not wearing a helmet.

A motorist was travelling northbound on Barron Road. They ran the stop sign at Groveland Road, continued straight and struck a sign, mailbox, and tree. The driver was pronounced died at the hospital. It is believed the driver suffered a medical emergency causing the crash.
